story.text: MUMBAI Jan 2 India's top bus and truck maker, Tata Motors Ltd. (TAMO.BO) said on Friday vehicle sales rose 37 percent in December to 48,792 units from 35,598 units a year earlier. New York-listed Tata Motors (TTM.N) said sales of commercial vehicles rose 50 percent to 28,179 units from 18,730 units, while sales of passenger vehicles rose 27 percent to 16,515 units. Exports rose 7 percent to 4,098 units.
story.title: india ' s tata motors dec vehicle sales up 37 pct y / y
